desc.zh: 顺和地铁，始建于2024年6月24日，截止至2025年7月1日，共建7条线路（1、2、3、4、5、6、27号线），全长约112千米，全部站点皆开通。
desc.en: Shunhe Metro, established on June 24, 2024, has constructed a total of 7 lines (Line 1, Line 2, Line 3, Line 4, Line 5, Line 6, and Line 27) as of July 1, 2025. With a total length of approximately 112 kilometers, all stations have been put into operation.
